details.fellowshipSong: There Shall Be Showers of Blessing #467
details.songOfAdoration: How Sweet and Awesome Is the Place

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: The Eliza Broadus state mission offering goal is $2,500.
We will meet at Rawlings-Stinson park tonight at 6:00 PM. Bring a lawn chair (or two).
If you are interested in helping host our booth at Shaping Clay Jubilee (Oct. 4-5), please sign up in the foyer. We will pass out apple cider and invitations.
We will hold a treat giveaway in the lawn during county trick or treat hours (likely Thursday, 10/31, 5-7 PM). Please consider setting up and/or donating candy. Look for flyers soon.
